channel.title: Discord on Seasalt.ai's SeaSuite Powers Contact Centers of the Future.
channel.description: Recent content in Discord on Seasalt.ai's SeaSuite Powers Contact Centers of the Future.

item.title: Text-to-Speech on Discord: A TTS Discord Bot Case Study
item.description: After launching SeaVoice, one of the fastest and most accurate text-to-speech and speech-to-text bots on Discord, we wanted to understand how users were actually interacting with the services.

item.title: SeaVoice Discord Bot: Backend & Stability Improvements
item.description: The SeaVoice Discord Bot has been gaining popularity as one of the best options for transcribing speech in Discord voice channels.

item.title: SeaVoice Discord Bot: The First to Provide Downloadable Voice Recording with AI Transcriptions
item.description: The SeaVoice Discord Bot has been gaining popularity as one of the best options for transcribing speech in Discord voice channels.

item.title: Discord (3/3): Discord & Twilio Flex: Bringing Flex Contact Center into Uncharted Territory
item.description: This is our last post in a three-part series about customer engagement on Discord.

item.title: Discord (2/3): How to Create a Discord Community and Bot for Your Brand
item.description: Our blog post, “Discord: A New Frontier for Customer Engagement”, covered Discord’s rise in popularity, and how brands can capitalize on this new social platform to form their own online communities and engage with customers.

item.title: Discord (1/3): A New Frontier for Customer Engagement
item.description: Discord’s user numbers have soared in recent years and the platform has now rebranded itself as the ‘home for your communities and friends’.
